001
002package com.commercetools.api.models.product;
003
004import java.time.LocalDate;
005import java.time.LocalTime;
006import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
007import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
008import java.util.*;
009import java.util.stream.Collectors;
010
011import com.commercetools.api.models.common.LocalizedString;
012import com.commercetools.api.models.common.Reference;
013import com.commercetools.api.models.common.TypedMoney;
014import com.commercetools.api.models.product_type.AttributeLocalizedEnumValue;
015import com.commercetools.api.models.product_type.AttributePlainEnumValue;
016
017public class AttributeAccessor {
018    public static Map<String, Object> asAttributeMap(final ProductVariant variant) {
019        return variant.getAttributes().stream().collect(Collectors.toMap(Attribute::getName, Attribute::getValue));
020    }
021
022    public static Map<String, Attribute> asMap(final ProductVariant variant) {
023        return asMap(variant.getAttributes());
024    }
025
026    public static Map<String, Attribute> asMap(final List<Attribute> attributes) {
027        return attributes.stream().collect(Collectors.toMap(Attribute::getName, attribute -> attribute));
028    }
029
030    public static LocalDate asDate(final Attribute attribute) {
031        Object value = attribute.getValue();
032        if (value instanceof LocalDate) {
033            return (LocalDate) value;
034        }
035        return LocalDate.parse((String) value, DateTimeFormatter.ISO_LOCAL_DATE);
036    }
037
038    public static LocalTime asTime(final Attribute attribute) {
039        Object value = attribute.getValue();
040        if (value instanceof LocalTime) {
041            return (LocalTime) value;
042        }
043        return LocalTime.parse((String) value, DateTimeFormatter.ISO_LOCAL_TIME);
044    }
045
046    public static ZonedDateTime asDateTime(final Attribute attribute) {
047        Object value = attribute.getValue();
048        if (value instanceof ZonedDateTime) {
049            return (ZonedDateTime) value;
050        }
051        return ZonedDateTime.parse((String) value, DateTimeFormatter.ISO_ZONED_DATE_TIME);
052    }
053
054    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
055    public static List<LocalDate> asSetDate(final Attribute attribute) {
056        return ((List<Object>) attribute.getValue()).stream().map(value -> {
057            if (value instanceof LocalDate) {
058                return (LocalDate) value;
059            }
060            return LocalDate.parse((String) value, DateTimeFormatter.ISO_LOCAL_DATE);
061        }).collect(Collectors.toList());
062    }
063
064    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
065    public static List<LocalTime> asSetTime(final Attribute attribute) {
066        return ((List<Object>) attribute.getValue()).stream().map(value -> {
067            if (value instanceof LocalTime) {
068                return (LocalTime) value;
069            }
070            return LocalTime.parse((String) value, DateTimeFormatter.ISO_LOCAL_TIME);
071        }).collect(Collectors.toList());
072    }
073
074    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
075    public static List<ZonedDateTime> asSetDateTime(final Attribute attribute) {
076        return ((List<Object>) attribute.getValue()).stream().map(value -> {
077            if (value instanceof ZonedDateTime) {
078                return (ZonedDateTime) value;
079            }
080            return ZonedDateTime.parse((String) value, DateTimeFormatter.ISO_ZONED_DATE_TIME);
081        }).collect(Collectors.toList());
082    }
083
084    public static String asString(final Attribute attribute) {
085        return (String) attribute.getValue();
086    }
087
088    public static Boolean asBoolean(final Attribute attribute) {
089        return (Boolean) attribute.getValue();
090    }
091
092    public static Double asDouble(final Attribute attribute) {
093        return (Double) attribute.getValue();
094    }
095
096    public static LocalizedString asLocalizedString(final Attribute attribute) {
097        return (LocalizedString) attribute.getValue();
098    }
099
100    public static AttributePlainEnumValue asEnum(final Attribute attribute) {
101        return (AttributePlainEnumValue) attribute.getValue();
102    }
103
104    public static AttributeLocalizedEnumValue asLocalizedEnum(final Attribute attribute) {
105        return (AttributeLocalizedEnumValue) attribute.getValue();
106    }
107
108    public static Long asLong(final Attribute attribute) {
109        return (Long) attribute.getValue();
110    }
111
112    public static Reference asReference(final Attribute attribute) {
113        return (Reference) attribute.getValue();
114    }
115
116    public static TypedMoney asMoney(final Attribute attribute) {
117        return (TypedMoney) attribute.getValue();
118    }
119
120    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
121    public static List<String> asSetString(final Attribute attribute) {
122        return (List<String>) attribute.getValue();
123    }
124
125    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
126    public static List<Boolean> asSetBoolean(final Attribute attribute) {
127        return (List<Boolean>) attribute.getValue();
128    }
129
130    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
131    public static List<Double> asSetDouble(final Attribute attribute) {
132        return (List<Double>) attribute.getValue();
133    }
134
135    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
136    public static List<LocalizedString> asSetLocalizedString(final Attribute attribute) {
137        return (List<LocalizedString>) attribute.getValue();
138    }
139
140    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
141    public static List<AttributePlainEnumValue> asSetEnum(final Attribute attribute) {
142        return (List<AttributePlainEnumValue>) attribute.getValue();
143    }
144
145    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
146    public static List<AttributeLocalizedEnumValue> asSetLocalizedEnum(final Attribute attribute) {
147        return (List<AttributeLocalizedEnumValue>) attribute.getValue();
148    }
149
150    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
151    public static List<Long> asSetLong(final Attribute attribute) {
152        return (List<Long>) attribute.getValue();
153    }
154
155    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
156    public static List<Reference> asSetReference(final Attribute attribute) {
157        return (List<Reference>) attribute.getValue();
158    }
159
160    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
161    public static List<TypedMoney> asSetMoney(final Attribute attribute) {
162        return (List<TypedMoney>) attribute.getValue();
163    }
164
165    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
166    public static List<Attribute> asNested(final Attribute attribute) {
167        return (List<Attribute>) attribute.getValue();
168    }
169
170    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
171    public static List<List<Attribute>> asSetNested(final Attribute attribute) {
172        return (List<List<Attribute>>) attribute.getValue();
173    }
174}
